text: Gary Weiss is an American investigative journalist, columnist and author. He wrote two books about the ethics and morality of Wall Street.Author biography, http://gary-weiss.com The articles he wrote for Business Week exposed organized crime on Wall Street and the Salomon Brothers bond trading scandal in the 1990s.
